member.name: M:Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Providers.EcomProvider.EcomDestinationWriter.AddMappingsToJobThatNeedsToBeThereForMoveToMainTables
member.remarks: Source columns are irrelevant, but must be set, so they are set to a random column

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Providers.EcomProvider.EcomDestinationWriter.GetExistingProductDataRow(System.String)
member.summary: Search for existing product by ProductID, if not found then searches by ProductNumber, and then by ProductName
member.returns: Returns existing DataRow with product information if found, otherwise null

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Providers.EcomProvider.EcomProvider.GetSchema(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets source or destination schema for Ecom Provider
